Every time I mount the ladder Jebidiah will fling off at 2 m/s, wasting a lot of Mono. I'm down to 20% RCS fuel. What should I do?

I've tried tilting upwards to align with the ladder, but it keeps happening.
Approach REAL slow.. when I say slow I mean SLOW. Its hard to do in EVA but it can be done.
I've gone through 80% fuel, I've tried going slow, its a wierd physics effect with ladders I suppose...
Yeah I wish I could help you more but EVA is funky sometimes. Could try a quick save then reload?
fly around until you find the option to board instead of grab then you will board immediately.

there is a point when you get close enough, you can just board the ship w/out actually touching it, but, it takes coming in under 1m/s which is hard to do, best advice, calm down, take a breather for a minute. then, come back to jeb, and go as slow as you can. best of luck
Next time try turning the ship so the ladder is more accessible first, coming in underneath the ladder can lead to some weird physics.
So, guys, I did it and got a cool 10 Research Points and saved Jeb! Thanks
